title: Diamond Janna dives 1v2 alone. and.......
body:
Dies. 

Blames me for playing GP Bot.

Calls me trash and says "that's why you're stuck in gold"

Laughed and let her die a few times because she mad bad plays.

After she left my lane i went 1v2 and then this happened.

http://imgur.com/O1YWbZb,FhR6tvF



People buying diamond accounts ftl

And we had to go against this 4v5...

http://imgur.com/O1YWbZb,FhR6tvF#1
